name: Chanchal Dabriya
intro_summary: To be able to work in an efficient organisation that provides ample opportunities in order to achieve continuous development and growth of my skills and always Inspire me to Aspire for MORE.

Responsible for creating smooth & pixel perfect UI components. Also contributed to Email templates
